0.$description: 0px - No spacing. Use to remove spacing or when elements should touch.

25.$description: 1px - Hairline spacing. Use for very tight spacing or as a separator gap.

50.$description: 2px - Extra tight spacing. Use for minimal gaps between related elements like icon and text in a compact button.

100.$description: 4px - Tight spacing. Use for small gaps within closely related elements, like text and icons in buttons or badges.

150.$description: 6px - Small spacing. Use for gaps between related elements within a component.

200.$description: 8px - Base spacing (most common). Use for standard gaps between elements, padding in small components, and vertical rhythm in forms.

250.$description: 10px - Small-medium spacing. Use for padding in compact buttons and inputs.

300.$description: 12px - Medium spacing. Use for padding in standard buttons, inputs, and gaps between related component groups.

400.$description: 16px - Standard spacing. Use for padding in cards, gaps between sections, and standard component padding.

500.$description: 20px - Medium-large spacing. Use for padding in larger components and gaps between distinct sections.

600.$description: 24px - Large spacing. Use for card padding, spacing between major sections, and generous padding in containers.

800.$description: 32px - Extra large spacing. Use for prominent separation between sections and generous padding in large containers.

1000.$description: 40px - Very large spacing. Use for major section separation and padding in large layouts.

1200.$description: 48px - Extra extra large spacing. Use for significant visual separation between major page sections.

1600.$description: 64px - Huge spacing. Use for page-level padding and major layout separations.

2000.$description: 80px - Very huge spacing. Use for generous page margins and large layout gutters.

2400.$description: 96px - Massive spacing. Use for dramatic page sections and oversized layout margins.

3200.$description: 128px - Ultra massive spacing. Use for hero sections and extremely generous layout spacing.
